Package teal.physics.em

Provides classes and interfaces for adding electromagnetic objects to the world.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GeneratesB
    Objects that generate a magnetic field should implement GeneratesB.
    GeneratesE
    Objects that generate a Electric field should implement GeneratesE.
    GeneratesP
    Objects that generate a P field should implement GeneratesP.
    HasCharge
    WorldObjects that have a Charge (Q) should implement HasCharge Implementing this interface allows read / write access to your charge property.
    HasCurrent
    WorldObjects that have Current (I) should implement HasCurrent Implementing this interface allows read / write access to your current property.
    HasDipoleMoment
    All EM objects which have dipole moment should implement this interface.
    HasInductance
    All EM objects which have inductance should implement this interface.
    HasResistance
    WorldObjects that have Resistance (R) should implement HasResistance Implementing this interface allows read / write access to your resistance property.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BField
    This class is a magnetic field implementation of CompositeField.
    Circuit
    The teal.sim.physical.em.Circuit class represents an idealized geometry electric circuit, which is defined over an infinte length cylindrical shell.
    CircuitParticleSystem  
    Coil
    This class extends RingOfCurrent, by providing a new graphical node.
    CoilBeanInfo  
    ConductingSphericalShell
    Represents a conducting spherical isolated shell centered at the origin in the presence of a point charge.
    ConstantField
    ConstantField is an object that generates a constant field (electric or magnetic) throughout space in a given direction.
    CurrentSlab
    Represents a infinite slab of current
    CylindricalField
    Generates a constant field (maybe deprecated by ConstantField?)
    CylindricalMagnet
    Represents an cylindrical magnet.
    Dipole
    Represents a Three Dimension Dipole in Cartesian Coordinates.
    DipoleBeanInfo  
    EField
    This class is an electric field implementation of CompositeField.
    ElectricDipole
    Represents a Three Dimension Electric Dipole in Cartesian Coordinates.
    ElectricDipoleBeanInfo  
    EMEngine
    EMEngine is the Physics simulation engine.
    EMObject
    Provides a common base for all Electro-Magnetic classes, currently only used to trigger Spatial changes.
    EMRadiator
    This is a very specialized object for use in the EMRadiatorApp.
    EMRadiatorBeanInfo  
    FiniteWire
    Represents a finite current carrying wire.
    GenericBField
    This is a wrapper class that wraps a GenericFieldGenerator as a magnetic field.
    GenericEField
    This is a wrapper class that wraps a GenericFieldGenerator as an electric field.
    GenericPField
    This is a wrapper class that wraps a GenericFieldGenerator as a Pauli field.
    HollowCurrentShell
    Represents a infinite slab of current
    InfiniteConductingPlane
    Represents a conducting spherical isolated shell centered at the origin in the presence of a point charge.
    InfiniteLineCharge
    Represents an infinite line of charge.
    InfiniteWire
    Represents an infinite current carrying wire.
    InfiniteWireBeanInfo  
    LineMagneticDipole
    Represents an "extended" line magnetic dipole.
    MagneticDipole
    Represents a magnetic point-dipole.
    MagneticDipoleBeanInfo  
    PField
    A utility class used in construction if Electric Field Lines
    PointCharge
    Represents the most basic EM object, a point charge.
    PointChargeBeanInfo  
    PointChargeConductingSphere
    Represents the most basic EM object, a point charge.
    RingOfCurrent
    The ring of current class.
    RingOfCurrentBeanInfo  
    Seafloor
    This represents a very specialized object used in the Seafloor applet for modeling seafloor ridge spreading.
    SeafloorBeanInfo  
    SimEM  

Package teal.physics.em Description

Provides classes and interfaces for adding electromagnetic objects to the world. The electromagnetic objects range from rings of current to point charges.
